summary:
Lorefriendly ? recipes for creating irongall-kinda ink. iron salts + tanning acid and a thickener ...
For your scroll scribing needs ...
descriptionHtml:
[b]UPDATE !! [/b] Scroll and quill the successor for skyre players> [url="http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55388"] here [/url]

Warning, these recipes require Skyrim.esm and LEATHER STRIPS !

I just made this stupid thing for skyre's scroll crafting, you might not want it now but ... PerMa is comming ...

2 recipes for papers out of ruined books
1 recipe for a quill using a hawk's feather
and the recipe for ink as illustrated bellow:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/54945-2-1402938818.png[/img]
you might wanna merge this into some patch esp you have using TES5Edit.
author: Excinerus
